label: 詔
対訳語: A written command of the tennō
本: The Emergence of Japanese Kingship . Stanford University Press . 1997
説明文: (alt., shō) A written command of the tennō, usually concerning primary matters of state such as succession and official appointments. Following protocols established by the codes, such documents were ordered by royal command, drafted by the Ministry of Central Affairs (Nakatsukasashō), approved by the tennō, and then sent on to the Council of State for promulgation. [天皇、中務省]
